main event: A report of two unidentified lights observed in the sky near Akron, Ohio in January 1963
interesting points: The objects were observed for 20-25 minutes, appearing to disappear and reappear in the sky.
The objects had dull yellow lights that faded on and off, and were surrounded by a ring of bright lights.
The objects moved slowly to the southeast and were fairly close to the witnesses.
One witness was driving towards the objects when he arrived home and found his wife had also seen them from their house.
The objects changed color to red upon disappearing, and on the third disappearance changed to white.
